description: Want to get some plants but don't have time to care for them or simply don't know how to choose? Our Quarterly Easy Care Plant Subscription will be a delight whether you are already a plant enthusiast or just starting your plant collection and want what no one else has. Subscribers receive an easy care" plant in a 4" or 6” diameter grow pot (you choose) delivered to their door every quarter. This subscription is made for someone who wants to enjoy a green space surrounded by plants but doesn't want it to be a full-time job, a houseplant pro that’s looking to continue to grow, or someone who just loves surprises and trying new things!
data.title: Quarterly Easy Care Plant Subscription
